description: A responsive React application that utilises Gutendex API that pulls books from Gutenberg Project epub databas so that users can read free classical books on the go. Books are displayed using React Reader (powered by ePubJS). Users can filters their search by author, title or topic. A book can be read directly or added to a bookshelf for later. Users can also review their read books with star rating and review functionaltiy.
quickDescription: Read free classical books on the go

description: A Makeup e-commerce application using React and a free MakeUp API to display products. Users are able to save their favourite products, add and remove items from thier cart using Redux. Users are able to filter thier search by product type, brand and price. Users are also able to customise how many products are shown on each page to increase user interactivity.

Responsive car rental application that provides user with affordable rates. Users are able to able to select their desired vechile and provided with forms to complete before being navigate to the next page.
